query:
SELECT 
  c.id,
  c.title,
  c.description,
  c.courseType,
  c.isActive,
  COUNT(DISTINCT q.id) as total
FROM courses c
LEFT JOIN topics t ON t.courseId = c.id
LEFT JOIN questions q ON q.topicId = t.id
WHERE c.isActive = 1
GROUP BY c.id, c.title, c.description, c.courseType, c.isActive
LIMIT 3;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3wc5j91T7XwfNX4.406ada0c06a9 --database RXc4pG5Wbo6eGZhnWSXpwa --execute SELECT 
  c.id,
  c.title,
  c.description,
  c.courseType,
  c.isActive,
  COUNT(DISTINCT q.id) as total
FROM courses c
LEFT JOIN topics t ON t.courseId = c.id
LEFT JOIN questions q ON q.topicId = t.id
WHERE c.isActive = 1
GROUP BY c.id, c.title, c.description, c.courseType, c.isActive
LIMIT 3;

rows.title: IT-Sicherheit Sensibilisierung

rows.title: Datenschutz Zertifizierung
